subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* {{l|mul|⺼}} U+2EBC (when used as a left Chinese radical in compositions)

The left component form ⺼looks very similar to ⺝, the left radical form of {{m|mul|月||moon|sc=Hani}}, and is often drawn identically in compounds, though they are etymologically distinct, and careful usage distinguishes the cross strokes, with ⺼ written with unattached diagonal strokes. This is particularly an issue in looking up characters by radical; compare [[Index:Chinese radical/月|月 index]] and [[Index:Chinese radical/肉|肉 index]].

The radical form ⺼ may also appear twisted to a diagonal, resembling [[夕]] with an added line, as in [[祭]], [[然]], and [[將]].

subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=2|rs=肉00}}

# [[flesh]], [[meat]]

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=k|しし|acc=1}}

subSections.title: Noun
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|肉%合い|しし%あい}}: how someone or something is [[flesh out|fleshed out]], one's [[build]]
* {{ja-r|肉%置き|しし%おき}}: how someone or something is [[flesh out|fleshed out]], one's [[build]]
* {{ja-r|肉%付き|しし%つき}}: how someone or something is [[flesh out|fleshed out]], one's [[build]]
* {{ja-r|肉%付く|しし%づく}}: to become [[fatter]], to become [[meatier]]; to make someone or something fatter or meatier
* {{ja-r|肉%醤|しし%びしお}}: [[salted]] meat, salted fish; the [[salted]] and [[mummified]] [[body]] of an [[executed]] person, a practice of [[punishment]] carried out in ancient China
* {{ja-r|肉%骨|しし%ぼね}}: [[bone]]s from which the [[meat]] has been removed; a [[skeleton]]
* {{ja-r|肉%叢|しし%むら}}: a [[cut]] or [[hunk]] of [[meat]]; the [[physical]] or [[corporeal]] [[body]], the [[flesh]]
* {{ja-r|肉%病|しし%やみ}}: {{qualifier|rare}} [[obesity]], a [[disease]] whereby the body becomes [[fat]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|にく|yomi=on}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=にく}} {{m|ltc|肉|tr=*njiuk}}. Compare modern {{cog|nan|肉|tr=jiok<sup>8</sup>}} or {{cog|hak|肉|tr=ngiuk<sup>7</sup>}}.

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text: {{ja-pron|yomi=goon|にく|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|にく}}

# [[meat]], the [[muscle]] and [[fat]] tissue of an [[animal]] used as [[food]]
# the [[flesh]] of an [[animal]]
# the [[flesh]] of a [[fruit]] or [[vegetable]]
# one's [[body]], as opposed to [[spirit]]
# the [[thickness]] of a thing
#: {{ja-usex|板の'''肉'''|いた の '''にく'''|the '''thickness''' of a board}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=にく|metaphor}} the [[flesh]] or [[meat]] of something, such as an idea, structure, or argument
#: {{ja-usex|議論に'''肉'''をつける|ぎろん に '''にく''' を つける|to put some '''meat''' on an argument, to '''flesh''' out an argument}}
# an [[ink pad]], a [[stamp pad]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=にく|theater|kabuki}} short for {{m|ja|肉襦袢|tr=niku juban}}: flesh-toned undergarments worn by actors and shown when the character has to display their skin

subSections.title: Synonyms
Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|牛%肉|ぎゅう%にく}}: [[beef]]
* {{ja-r|狗%肉|く%にく}}: [[dog meat]]
* {{ja-r|鶏%肉|けい%にく}}, {{ja-r|鶏%肉|とり%にく}}: [[chicken]] {{gloss|meat}}
* {{ja-r|鯨%肉|げい%にく}}: [[whale]] [[meat]]
* {{ja-r|鳥%肉|とり%にく}}: [[meat]] of a [[bird]], in particular [[meat]] of a [[chicken]]
* {{ja-r|肉%交|にく%こう}}: [[sexual intercourse]]
* {{ja-r|肉%羹|にく%こう}}: [[meat]] [[broth]]
* {{ja-r|肉%汁|にく%じゅう}}: [[meat]] [[broth]]; [[meat]] [[juice]]; [[gravy]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|肉%漿|にく%しょう}}: [[meat]] [[juice]]
* {{ja-r|肉%饅|にく%まん}}: [[nikuman]]
* {{ja-r|肉%饅%頭|にく%まん%じゅう}}: [[nikuman]]
* {{ja-r|肉%類|にく%るい}}: a [[kind]] of [[meat]], the [[sort]] of meat
* {{ja-r|馬%肉|ば%にく}}: [[horsemeat]]
* {{ja-r|豚%肉|ぶた%にく}}, {{ja-r|豚%肉|とん%にく}}: [[pork]]
* {{ja-r|挽%肉|ひき%にく}}: [[mince]]d [[meat]], [[ground]] meat
* {{ja-r|羊%肉|よう%にく}}: [[mutton]]
{{der-bottom}}
